Posts.Content: Hi. Yeah I've had both but I suppose I was lucky enough they did all my procedures @ my breast clinic where I live. The stereo biopsy is bit more in depth then the wire - core biopsy. Mine came back inconclusive abnormal micro -calcifications. Just have to hope I don't have any changes @ next mammo. I do wish you luck and hope all goes well.
Posts.Title: clustered microcalcifications

Posts.Content: The ultrasound normally to check your lymph nodes. The waiting time is dreadful. I know I should be positive but my head tells me different. Hope all goes well - let us know how you get on. Good luck.
Posts.Title: clustered microcalcifications

Posts.Content: Like you never heard of them before - then all of sudden I have two areas of cluster micro calcifications larger one is benign smaller cluster abnormal. Researching isn't good thing but we all do it. Good luck next week. Chin up
Posts.Title: clustered microcalcifications

Posts.Content: Just wondering if anyone had any problems with their breast after having core biopsy then 7days a stereo biopsy. Mine has a dull ache all the time - some days worse then others - also lifting anything heavy in my left arm very painful. Is it just trauma to the breast or what ?????. By the way had this done six months ago. Should I still ache ?
Posts.Title: clustered microcalcifications

Posts.Content: Hi. I know exactly how you feel. I'm 52 had my first mammo in oct 2012. Thought nothing of this my very first recall - one week later I received a letter to say I had to return to clinic because of something the radiologist had seen. One week later I returned to be told I had two areas of which could be micro calcifications. One week later returned for core biopsy on two area very scared did not know what to expect. This went ok had to wait another week for a telephone call to be told one area was abnormal and return for a vacuum assisted biopsy. Again returned one week later for this procedure. Did not know what to expect my husband came with me & had the procedure done. One week later received telephone to say this cluster is abnormal had to be referred to breast surgeon who tried to reassure me and placed me on yearly recalls. I know how you must feel. Because it was my first mammo they don't know how long they been there. Abnormal what's abnormal I feel like a time bomb waiting to go off. Like you find it very hard to talk to people. Sometimes feel on my own but I know there is other people out there just the same as me. I wish you luck and hope all goes well for you. Take care - thank you for listening to me.

Posts.Title: clustered microcalcifications

Posts.Content:
Hi chuckee54. I know how you feel playing the waiting game. Like you mine was my first recall thought nothing of having a mamo all of a sudden my life was turned upside down. I'm 8mths down the line from having core biospy then vacuum assisted biopsy like you they had a job of stopping the bleeding left me with a very bruised breast. My left breast still aches can't lift heavy objects. Next mammo in November just have to pray no changes if their are have to go through the whole procedure again. Don't know if I could do that again.
I wish you luck.

Posts.Title: clustered microcalcifications

Posts.Content: Hi chuckee54, I am so pleased for you I've been thinking of you - best news I've had today. Hopefully my abnormal breast will show no more changes in November - I can only hope. Good luck take care.
Posts.Title: clustered microcalcifications

Posts.Content:
In October 2012 aged fifty two was invited for my first mammo. Week later was called back to have a core biopsy on my left breast - I have micro-calcification in two places. One week later received a call to say the bigger cluster was benign - but the smaller cluster was B4 abnormal. Now I was called back to have a vaccum assisted biopsy. You have no idea how I was feeling - scared very scared. After this percedure I was left another week then got the call to say these are abnormal and to see the Breast surgeon two days later. Now I'm on yearly recalls - will these turn to cancer ? No one can tell me. Three months down the line my breast still aches -cant lift anything heavy with my left arm. Tired very tired of just thinking all the time. 
Sorry I should have said this is all new to me something that was routine as turned my life upside down. Don't think I was told enough what was happening to me - or maybe I just blocked everything out. J I've got my yearly appt through and seems to me I'm just waiting or one day told yes this is now BC.
